name: Planet Baker
description:
Planet Baking Simulator of Amazingness!

Grab some orders, chop some trees, heat up the time accelerators*, and get cooking!

Including:

  • Grab as many orders as you want
  • Prepare some planets for growing
  • Grow these planets very quickly!
  • Finalize with some ice and volcanoes!

How many can you make in 3 minutes??

* Batteries not included.

This game was made for the LibGDX Jam of December 2019, and thus is just a prototype for a game I may expand on in the future!

Source Code: https://github.com/redsponge-jams/TheWorldIsFood
